00060 /* NOTE: these defines are saved in keymap files, do not change values but just add new ones */
00061 enum {
00062     FLY_MODAL_CANCEL = 1,
00063     FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM,
00064     FLY_MODAL_ACCELERATE,
00065     FLY_MODAL_DECELERATE,
00066     FLY_MODAL_PAN_ENABLE,
00067     FLY_MODAL_PAN_DISABLE,
00068     FLY_MODAL_DIR_FORWARD,
00069     FLY_MODAL_DIR_BACKWARD,
00070     FLY_MODAL_DIR_LEFT,
00071     FLY_MODAL_DIR_RIGHT,
00072     FLY_MODAL_DIR_UP,
00073     FLY_MODAL_DIR_DOWN,
00074     FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_X,
00075     FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_Z,
00076     FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_ENABLE,
00077     FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_DISABLE,
00078     FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_ENABLE,
00079     FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_DISABLE
00080 
00081 };

00083 /* called in transform_ops.c, on each regeneration of keymaps  */
00084 void fly_modal_keymap(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00085 {
00086     static EnumPropertyItem modal_items[] = {
00087         {FLY_MODAL_CANCEL, "CANCEL", 0, "Cancel", ""},
00088         {FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM, "CONFIRM", 0, "Confirm", ""},
00089         {FLY_MODAL_ACCELERATE, "ACCELERATE", 0, "Accelerate", ""},
00090         {FLY_MODAL_DECELERATE, "DECELERATE", 0, "Decelerate", ""},
00091 
00092         {FLY_MODAL_PAN_ENABLE, "PAN_ENABLE", 0, "Pan Enable", ""},
00093         {FLY_MODAL_PAN_DISABLE, "PAN_DISABLE", 0, "Pan Disable", ""},
00094 
00095         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_FORWARD, "FORWARD", 0, "Fly Forward", ""},
00096         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_BACKWARD, "BACKWARD", 0, "Fly Backward", ""},
00097         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_LEFT, "LEFT", 0, "Fly Left", ""},
00098         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_RIGHT, "RIGHT", 0, "Fly Right", ""},
00099         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_UP, "UP", 0, "Fly Up", ""},
00100         {FLY_MODAL_DIR_DOWN, "DOWN", 0, "Fly Down", ""},
00101 
00102         {FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_X, "AXIS_LOCK_X", 0, "X Axis Correction", "X axis correction (toggle)"},
00103         {FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_Z, "AXIS_LOCK_Z", 0, "X Axis Correction", "Z axis correction (toggle)"},
00104 
00105         {FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_ENABLE, "PRECISION_ENABLE", 0, "Precision Enable", ""},
00106         {FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_DISABLE, "PRECISION_DISABLE", 0, "Precision Disable", ""},
00107 
00108         {FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_ENABLE, "FREELOOK_ENABLE", 0, "Rotation Enable", ""},
00109         {FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_DISABLE, "FREELOOK_DISABLE", 0, "Rotation Disable", ""},
00110 
00111         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}};
00112 
00113     wmKeyMap *keymap = WM_modalkeymap_get(keyconf, "View3D Fly Modal");
00114 
00115     /* this function is called for each spacetype, only needs to add map once */
00116     if (keymap && keymap->modal_items)
00117         return;
00118 
00119     keymap = WM_modalkeymap_add(keyconf, "View3D Fly Modal", modal_items);
00120 
00121     /* items for modal map */
00122     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ESCKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CANCEL);
00123     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, RIGHTMOUSE, KM_ANY, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CANCEL);
00124 
00125     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTMOUSE, KM_ANY, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00126     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, RETKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00127     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, SPACEKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00128     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADENTER, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM);
00129 
00130     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_ACCELERATE);
00131     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_DECELERATE);
00132     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, WHEELUPMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_ACCELERATE);
00133     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, WHEELDOWNMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_DECELERATE);
00134 
00135     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_PAN_ENABLE);
00136     /* XXX - Bug in the event system, middle mouse release doesnt work */
00137     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_PAN_DISABLE);
00138 
00139     /* WASD */
00140     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, WKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_FORWARD);
00141     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, SKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_BACKWARD);
00142     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, AKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_LEFT);
00143     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, DKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_RIGHT);
00144     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, RKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_UP);
00145     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, FKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_DIR_DOWN);
00146 
00147     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, XKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_X);
00148     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, ZKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0, FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_Z);
00149 
00150     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTSHIFTKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_ENABLE);
00151     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTSHIFTKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_DISABLE);
00152 
00153     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_ENABLE);
00154     WM_modalkeymap_add_item(keymap, LEFTCTRLKEY, KM_RELEASE, KM_ANY, 0, FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_DISABLE);
00155 
00156     /* assign map to operators */
00157     WM_modalkeymap_assign(keymap, "VIEW3D_OT_fly");
00158 }
00159 
00160 typedef struct FlyInfo {
00161     /* context stuff */
00162     RegionView3D *rv3d;
00163     View3D *v3d;
00164     ARegion *ar;
00165     Scene *scene;
00166 
00167     wmTimer *timer; /* needed for redraws */
00168 
00169     short state;
00170     short redraw;
00171     unsigned char use_precision;
00172     /* if the user presses shift they can look about
00173      * without moving the direction there looking */
00174     unsigned char use_freelook;
00175 
00176     int mval[2]; /* latest 2D mouse values */
00177     wmNDOFMotionData*ndof;  /* latest 3D mouse values */
00178 
00179     /* fly state state */
00180     float speed; /* the speed the view is moving per redraw */
00181     short axis; /* Axis index to move along by default Z to move along the view */
00182     short pan_view; /* when true, pan the view instead of rotating */
00183 
00184     /* relative view axis locking - xlock, zlock
00185      * 0) disabled
00186      * 1) enabled but not checking because mouse hasn't moved outside the margin since locking was checked an not needed
00187      *    when the mouse moves, locking is set to 2 so checks are done.
00188      * 2) mouse moved and checking needed, if no view altering is done its changed back to 1 */
00189     short xlock, zlock;
00190     float xlock_momentum, zlock_momentum; /* nicer dynamics */
00191     float grid; /* world scale 1.0 default */
00192 
00193     /* root most parent */
00194     Object *root_parent;
00195 
00196     /* backup values */
00197     float dist_backup; /* backup the views distance since we use a zero dist for fly mode */
00198     float ofs_backup[3]; /* backup the views offset in case the user cancels flying in non camera mode */
00199 
00200     /* backup the views quat in case the user cancels flying in non camera mode.
00201      * (quat for view, eul for camera) */
00202     float rot_backup[4];
00203     short persp_backup; /* remember if were ortho or not, only used for restoring the view if it was a ortho view */
00204 
00205     /* are we flying an ortho camera in perspective view,
00206      * which was originall in ortho view?
00207      * could probably figure it out but better be explicit */
00208     short is_ortho_cam;
00209     void *obtfm; /* backup the objects transform */
00210 
00211     /* compare between last state */
00212     double time_lastwheel; /* used to accelerate when using the mousewheel a lot */
00213     double time_lastdraw; /* time between draws */
00214 
00215     void *draw_handle_pixel;
00216 
00217     /* use for some lag */
00218     float dvec_prev[3]; /* old for some lag */
00219 
00220 } FlyInfo;
00221 
00222 static void drawFlyPixel(const struct bContext *UNUSED(C), struct ARegion *UNUSED(ar), void *arg)
00223 {
00224     FlyInfo *fly = arg;
00225 
00226     /* draws 4 edge brackets that frame the safe area where the
00227      * mouse can move during fly mode without spinning the view */
00228     float x1, x2, y1, y2;
00229 
00230     x1 = 0.45f * (float)fly->ar->winx;
00231     y1 = 0.45f * (float)fly->ar->winy;
00232     x2 = 0.55f * (float)fly->ar->winx;
00233     y2 = 0.55f * (float)fly->ar->winy;
00234     cpack(0);
00235 
00236     glBegin(GL_LINES);
00237     /* bottom left */
00238     glVertex2f(x1, y1);
00239     glVertex2f(x1, y1 + 5);
00240 
00241     glVertex2f(x1, y1);
00242     glVertex2f(x1 + 5, y1);
00243 
00244     /* top right */
00245     glVertex2f(x2, y2);
00246     glVertex2f(x2, y2 - 5);
00247 
00248     glVertex2f(x2, y2);
00249     glVertex2f(x2 - 5, y2);
00250 
00251     /* top left */
00252     glVertex2f(x1, y2);
00253     glVertex2f(x1, y2 - 5);
00254 
00255     glVertex2f(x1, y2);
00256     glVertex2f(x1 + 5, y2);
00257 
00258     /* bottom right */
00259     glVertex2f(x2, y1);
00260     glVertex2f(x2, y1 + 5);
00261 
00262     glVertex2f(x2, y1);
00263     glVertex2f(x2 - 5, y1);
00264     glEnd();
00265 }
00266 
00267 /* FlyInfo->state */
00268 #define FLY_RUNNING     0
00269 #define FLY_CANCEL      1
00270 #define FLY_CONFIRM     2
00271 
00272 static int initFlyInfo(bContext *C, FlyInfo *fly, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
00273 {
00274     wmWindow *win = CTX_wm_window(C);
00275     float upvec[3]; /* tmp */
00276     float mat[3][3];
00277 
00278     fly->rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
00279     fly->v3d = CTX_wm_view3d(C);
00280     fly->ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
00281     fly->scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00282 
00283 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00284     puts("\n-- fly begin --");
00285 #endif
00286 
00287     if (fly->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && fly->v3d->camera->id.lib) {
00288         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot fly a camera from an external library");
00289         return FALSE;
00290     }
00291 
00292     if (fly->v3d->ob_centre) {
00293         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot fly when the view is locked to an object");
00294         return FALSE;
00295     }
00296 
00297     if (fly->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB && fly->v3d->camera->constraints.first) {
00298         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot fly an object with constraints");
00299         return FALSE;
00300     }
00301 
00302     fly->state = FLY_RUNNING;
00303     fly->speed = 0.0f;
00304     fly->axis = 2;
00305     fly->pan_view = FALSE;
00306     fly->xlock = FALSE;
00307     fly->zlock = FALSE;
00308     fly->xlock_momentum = 0.0f;
00309     fly->zlock_momentum = 0.0f;
00310     fly->grid = 1.0f;
00311     fly->use_precision = FALSE;
00312     fly->use_freelook = FALSE;
00313 
00314 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DRAW_TOOMUCH
00315     fly->redraw = 1;
00316 #endif
00317     zero_v3(fly->dvec_prev);
00318 
00319     fly->timer = WM_event_add_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), win, TIMER, 0.01f);
00320 
00321     copy_v2_v2_int(fly->mval, event->mval);
00322     fly->ndof = NULL;
00323 
00324     fly->time_lastdraw = fly->time_lastwheel = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00325 
00326     fly->draw_handle_pixel = ED_region_draw_cb_activate(fly->ar->type, drawFlyPixel, fly, REGION_DRAW_POST_PIXEL);
00327 
00328     fly->rv3d->rflag |= RV3D_NAVIGATING; /* so we draw the corner margins */
00329 
00330     /* detect weather to start with Z locking */
00331     upvec[0] = 1.0f;
00332     upvec[1] = 0.0f;
00333     upvec[2] = 0.0f;
00334     copy_m3_m4(mat, fly->rv3d->viewinv);
00335     mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00336     if (fabs(upvec[2]) < 0.1)
00337         fly->zlock = 1;
00338     upvec[0] = 0;
00339     upvec[1] = 0;
00340     upvec[2] = 0;
00341 
00342     fly->persp_backup = fly->rv3d->persp;
00343     fly->dist_backup = fly->rv3d->dist;
00344 
00345     /* check for flying ortho camera - which we cant support well
00346      * we _could_ also check for an ortho camera but this is easier */
00347     if ((fly->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) &&
00348         (fly->v3d->camera != NULL) &&
00349         (fly->rv3d->is_persp == FALSE))
00350     {
00351         ((Camera *)fly->v3d->camera->data)->type = CAM_PERSP;
00352         fly->is_ortho_cam = TRUE;
00353     }
00354 
00355     if (fly->rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
00356         Object *ob_back;
00357         if ((U.uiflag & USER_CAM_LOCK_NO_PARENT) == 0 && (fly->root_parent = fly->v3d->camera->parent)) {
00358             while (fly->root_parent->parent)
00359                 fly->root_parent = fly->root_parent->parent;
00360             ob_back = fly->root_parent;
00361         }
00362         else {
00363             ob_back = fly->v3d->camera;
00364         }
00365 
00366         /* store the original camera loc and rot */
00367         /* TODO. axis angle etc */
00368 
00369         fly->obtfm = object_tfm_backup(ob_back);
00370 
00371         where_is_object(fly->scene, fly->v3d->camera);
00372         negate_v3_v3(fly->rv3d->ofs, fly->v3d->camera->obmat[3]);
00373 
00374         fly->rv3d->dist = 0.0;
00375     }
00376     else {
00377         /* perspective or ortho */
00378         if (fly->rv3d->persp == RV3D_ORTHO)
00379             fly->rv3d->persp = RV3D_PERSP;  /* if ortho projection, make perspective */
00380 
00381         copy_qt_qt(fly->rot_backup, fly->rv3d->viewquat);
00382         copy_v3_v3(fly->ofs_backup, fly->rv3d->ofs);
00383 
00384         /* the dist defines a vector that is infront of the offset
00385          * to rotate the view about.
00386          * this is no good for fly mode because we
00387          * want to rotate about the viewers center.
00388          * but to correct the dist removal we must
00389          * alter offset so the view doesn't jump. */
00390 
00391         fly->rv3d->dist = 0.0f;
00392 
00393         upvec[2] = fly->dist_backup; /* x and y are 0 */
00394         mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00395         sub_v3_v3(fly->rv3d->ofs, upvec);
00396         /* Done with correcting for the dist */
00397     }
00398 
00399     /* center the mouse, probably the UI mafia are against this but without its quite annoying */
00400     WM_cursor_warp(win, fly->ar->winrct.xmin + fly->ar->winx / 2, fly->ar->winrct.ymin + fly->ar->winy / 2);
00401 
00402     return 1;
00403 }
00404 
00405 static int flyEnd(bContext *C, FlyInfo *fly)
00406 {
00407     RegionView3D *rv3d = fly->rv3d;
00408     View3D *v3d = fly->v3d;
00409 
00410     float upvec[3];
00411 
00412     if (fly->state == FLY_RUNNING)
00413         return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
00414 
00415 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00416     puts("\n-- fly end --");
00417 #endif
00418 
00419     WM_event_remove_timer(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), fly->timer);
00420 
00421     ED_region_draw_cb_exit(fly->ar->type, fly->draw_handle_pixel);
00422 
00423     rv3d->dist = fly->dist_backup;
00424 
00425     if (fly->state == FLY_CANCEL) {
00426         /* Revert to original view? */
00427         if (fly->persp_backup == RV3D_CAMOB) { /* a camera view */
00428             Object *ob_back;
00429             ob_back = (fly->root_parent) ? fly->root_parent : fly->v3d->camera;
00430 
00431             /* store the original camera loc and rot */
00432             object_tfm_restore(ob_back, fly->obtfm);
00433 
00434             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_back->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00435         }
00436         else {
00437             /* Non Camera we need to reset the view back to the original location bacause the user canceled*/
00438             copy_qt_qt(rv3d->viewquat, fly->rot_backup);
00439             copy_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, fly->ofs_backup);
00440             rv3d->persp = fly->persp_backup;
00441         }
00442     }
00443     else if (fly->persp_backup == RV3D_CAMOB) { /* camera */
00444         DAG_id_tag_update(fly->root_parent ? &fly->root_parent->id : &v3d->camera->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00445     }
00446     else { /* not camera */
00447 
00448         /* Apply the fly mode view */
00449         /* restore the dist */
00450         float mat[3][3];
00451         upvec[0] = upvec[1] = 0;
00452         upvec[2] = fly->dist_backup; /* x and y are 0 */
00453         copy_m3_m4(mat, rv3d->viewinv);
00454         mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00455         add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, upvec);
00456         /* Done with correcting for the dist */
00457     }
00458 
00459     if (fly->is_ortho_cam) {
00460         ((Camera *)fly->v3d->camera->data)->type = CAM_ORTHO;
00461     }
00462 
00463     rv3d->rflag &= ~RV3D_NAVIGATING;
00464 //XXX2.5    BIF_view3d_previewrender_signal(fly->sa, PR_DBASE|PR_DISPRECT); /* not working at the moment not sure why */
00465 
00466     if (fly->obtfm)
00467         MEM_freeN(fly->obtfm);
00468     if (fly->ndof)
00469         MEM_freeN(fly->ndof);
00470 
00471     if (fly->state == FLY_CONFIRM) {
00472         MEM_freeN(fly);
00473         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00474     }
00475 
00476     MEM_freeN(fly);
00477     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00478 }
00479 
00480 static void flyEvent(FlyInfo *fly, wmEvent *event)
00481 {
00482     if (event->type == TIMER && event->customdata == fly->timer) {
00483         fly->redraw = 1;
00484     }
00485     else if (event->type == MOUSEMOVE) {
00486         copy_v2_v2_int(fly->mval, event->mval);
00487     }
00488     else if (event->type == NDOF_MOTION) {
00489         /* do these automagically get delivered? yes. */
00490         // puts("ndof motion detected in fly mode!");
00491         // static const char* tag_name = "3D mouse position";
00492 
00493         wmNDOFMotionData *incoming_ndof = (wmNDOFMotionData *)event->customdata;
00494         switch (incoming_ndof->progress) {
00495             case P_STARTING:
00496                 /* start keeping track of 3D mouse position */
00497 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00498                 puts("start keeping track of 3D mouse position");
00499 #endif
00500             /* fall through... */
00501             case P_IN_PROGRESS:
00502                 /* update 3D mouse position */
00503 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00504                 putchar('.'); fflush(stdout);
00505 #endif
00506                 if (fly->ndof == NULL) {
00507                     // fly->ndof = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(wmNDOFMotionData), tag_name);
00508                     fly->ndof = MEM_dupallocN(incoming_ndof);
00509                     // fly->ndof = malloc(sizeof(wmNDOFMotionData));
00510                 }
00511                 else {
00512                     memcpy(fly->ndof, incoming_ndof, sizeof(wmNDOFMotionData));
00513                 }
00514                 break;
00515             case P_FINISHING:
00516                 // stop keeping track of 3D mouse position
00517 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00518                 puts("stop keeping track of 3D mouse position");
00519 #endif
00520                 if (fly->ndof) {
00521                     MEM_freeN(fly->ndof);
00522                     // free(fly->ndof);
00523                     fly->ndof = NULL;
00524                 }
00525                 /* update the time else the view will jump when 2D mouse/timer resume */
00526                 fly->time_lastdraw = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00527                 break;
00528             default:
00529                 break; /* should always be one of the above 3 */
00530         }
00531     }
00532     /* handle modal keymap first */
00533     else if (event->type == EVT_MODAL_MAP) {
00534         switch (event->val) {
00535             case FLY_MODAL_CANCEL:
00536                 fly->state = FLY_CANCEL;
00537                 break;
00538             case FLY_MODAL_CONFIRM:
00539                 fly->state = FLY_CONFIRM;
00540                 break;
00541 
00542             case FLY_MODAL_ACCELERATE:
00543             {
00544                 double time_currwheel;
00545                 float time_wheel;
00546 
00547                 time_currwheel = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00548                 time_wheel = (float)(time_currwheel - fly->time_lastwheel);
00549                 fly->time_lastwheel = time_currwheel;
00550                 /* Mouse wheel delays range from 0.5==slow to 0.01==fast */
00551                 time_wheel = 1.0f + (10.0f - (20.0f * MIN2(time_wheel, 0.5f))); /* 0-0.5 -> 0-5.0 */
00552 
00553                 if (fly->speed < 0.0f) {
00554                     fly->speed = 0.0f;
00555                 }
00556                 else {
00557                     fly->speed += fly->grid * time_wheel * (fly->use_precision ? 0.1f : 1.0f);
00558                 }
00559                 break;
00560             }
00561             case FLY_MODAL_DECELERATE:
00562             {
00563                 double time_currwheel;
00564                 float time_wheel;
00565 
00566                 time_currwheel = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00567                 time_wheel = (float)(time_currwheel - fly->time_lastwheel);
00568                 fly->time_lastwheel = time_currwheel;
00569                 time_wheel = 1.0f + (10.0f - (20.0f * MIN2(time_wheel, 0.5f))); /* 0-0.5 -> 0-5.0 */
00570 
00571                 if (fly->speed > 0.0f) {
00572                     fly->speed = 0;
00573                 }
00574                 else {
00575                     fly->speed -= fly->grid * time_wheel * (fly->use_precision ? 0.1f : 1.0f);
00576                 }
00577                 break;
00578             }
00579             case FLY_MODAL_PAN_ENABLE:
00580                 fly->pan_view = TRUE;
00581                 break;
00582             case FLY_MODAL_PAN_DISABLE:
00583 //XXX2.5        warp_pointer(cent_orig[0], cent_orig[1]);
00584                 fly->pan_view = FALSE;
00585                 break;
00586 
00587             /* implement WASD keys,
00588              * comments only for 'forward '*/
00589             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_FORWARD:
00590                 if (fly->axis == 2 && fly->speed < 0.0f) { /* reverse direction stops, tap again to continue */
00591                     fly->axis = -1;
00592                 }
00593                 else {
00594                     /* flip speed rather than stopping, game like motion,
00595                      * else increase like mousewheel if were already moving in that direction */
00596                     if (fly->speed < 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00597                     else if (fly->axis == 2) fly->speed += fly->grid;
00598                     fly->axis = 2;
00599                 }
00600                 break;
00601             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_BACKWARD:
00602                 if (fly->axis == 2 && fly->speed > 0.0f) {
00603                     fly->axis = -1;
00604                 }
00605                 else {
00606                     if (fly->speed > 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00607                     else if (fly->axis == 2) fly->speed -= fly->grid;
00608 
00609                     fly->axis = 2;
00610                 }
00611                 break;
00612             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_LEFT:
00613                 if (fly->axis == 0 && fly->speed < 0.0f) {
00614                     fly->axis = -1;
00615                 }
00616                 else {
00617                     if (fly->speed < 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00618                     else if (fly->axis == 0) fly->speed += fly->grid;
00619 
00620                     fly->axis = 0;
00621                 }
00622                 break;
00623             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_RIGHT:
00624                 if (fly->axis == 0 && fly->speed > 0.0f) {
00625                     fly->axis = -1;
00626                 }
00627                 else {
00628                     if (fly->speed > 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00629                     else if (fly->axis == 0) fly->speed -= fly->grid;
00630 
00631                     fly->axis = 0;
00632                 }
00633                 break;
00634             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_DOWN:
00635                 if (fly->axis == 1 && fly->speed < 0.0f) {
00636                     fly->axis = -1;
00637                 }
00638                 else {
00639                     if (fly->speed < 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00640                     else if (fly->axis == 1) fly->speed += fly->grid;
00641                     fly->axis = 1;
00642                 }
00643                 break;
00644             case FLY_MODAL_DIR_UP:
00645                 if (fly->axis == 1 && fly->speed > 0.0f) {
00646                     fly->axis = -1;
00647                 }
00648                 else {
00649                     if (fly->speed > 0.0f)   fly->speed = -fly->speed;
00650                     else if (fly->axis == 1) fly->speed -= fly->grid;
00651                     fly->axis = 1;
00652                 }
00653                 break;
00654 
00655             case FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_X:
00656                 if (fly->xlock)
00657                     fly->xlock = 0;
00658                 else {
00659                     fly->xlock = 2;
00660                     fly->xlock_momentum = 0.0;
00661                 }
00662                 break;
00663             case FLY_MODAL_AXIS_LOCK_Z:
00664                 if (fly->zlock)
00665                     fly->zlock = 0;
00666                 else {
00667                     fly->zlock = 2;
00668                     fly->zlock_momentum = 0.0;
00669                 }
00670                 break;
00671 
00672             case FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_ENABLE:
00673                 fly->use_precision = TRUE;
00674                 break;
00675             case FLY_MODAL_PRECISION_DISABLE:
00676                 fly->use_precision = FALSE;
00677                 break;
00678 
00679             case FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_ENABLE:
00680                 fly->use_freelook = TRUE;
00681                 break;
00682             case FLY_MODAL_FREELOOK_DISABLE:
00683                 fly->use_freelook = FALSE;
00684                 break;
00685         }
00686     }
00687 }
00688 
00689 static void move_camera(bContext *C, RegionView3D *rv3d, FlyInfo *fly, int orientationChanged, int positionChanged)
00690 {
00691     /* we are in camera view so apply the view ofs and quat to the view matrix and set the camera to the view */
00692 
00693     View3D*v3d = fly->v3d;
00694     Scene *scene = fly->scene;
00695     ID *id_key;
00696 
00697     /* transform the parent or the camera? */
00698     if (fly->root_parent) {
00699         Object *ob_update;
00700 
00701         float view_mat[4][4];
00702         float prev_view_mat[4][4];
00703         float prev_view_imat[4][4];
00704         float diff_mat[4][4];
00705         float parent_mat[4][4];
00706 
00707         ED_view3d_to_m4(prev_view_mat, fly->rv3d->ofs, fly->rv3d->viewquat, fly->rv3d->dist);
00708         invert_m4_m4(prev_view_imat, prev_view_mat);
00709         ED_view3d_to_m4(view_mat, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->dist);
00710         mult_m4_m4m4(diff_mat, view_mat, prev_view_imat);
00711         mult_m4_m4m4(parent_mat, diff_mat, fly->root_parent->obmat);
00712         object_apply_mat4(fly->root_parent, parent_mat, TRUE, FALSE);
00713 
00714         // where_is_object(scene, fly->root_parent);
00715 
00716         ob_update = v3d->camera->parent;
00717         while (ob_update) {
00718             DAG_id_tag_update(&ob_update->id, OB_RECALC_OB);
00719             ob_update = ob_update->parent;
00720         }
00721 
00722         id_key = &fly->root_parent->id;
00723     }
00724     else {
00725         float view_mat[4][4];
00726         ED_view3d_to_m4(view_mat, rv3d->ofs, rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->dist);
00727         object_apply_mat4(v3d->camera, view_mat, TRUE, FALSE);
00728         id_key = &v3d->camera->id;
00729     }
00730 
00731     /* record the motion */
00732     if (autokeyframe_cfra_can_key(scene, id_key)) {
00733         ListBase dsources = {NULL, NULL};
00734 
00735         /* add datasource override for the camera object */
00736         ANIM_relative_keyingset_add_source(&dsources, id_key, NULL, NULL);
00737 
00738         /* insert keyframes 
00739          *  1) on the first frame
00740          *  2) on each subsequent frame
00741          *      TODO: need to check in future that frame changed before doing this 
00742          */
00743         if (orientationChanged) {
00744             KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_ROTATION_ID);
00745             ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, (float)CFRA);
00746         }
00747         if (positionChanged) {
00748             KeyingSet *ks = ANIM_builtin_keyingset_get_named(NULL, ANIM_KS_LOCATION_ID);
00749             ANIM_apply_keyingset(C, &dsources, NULL, ks, MODIFYKEY_MODE_INSERT, (float)CFRA);
00750         }
00751 
00752         /* free temp data */
00753         BLI_freelistN(&dsources);
00754     }
00755 }
00756 
00757 static int flyApply(bContext *C, FlyInfo *fly)
00758 {
00759 #define FLY_ROTATE_FAC 2.5f /* more is faster */
00760 #define FLY_ZUP_CORRECT_FAC 0.1f /* amount to correct per step */
00761 #define FLY_ZUP_CORRECT_ACCEL 0.05f /* increase upright momentum each step */
00762 
00763     /* fly mode - Shift+F
00764      * a fly loop where the user can move move the view as if they are flying
00765      */
00766     RegionView3D *rv3d = fly->rv3d;
00767     ARegion *ar = fly->ar;
00768 
00769     float mat[3][3]; /* 3x3 copy of the view matrix so we can move along the view axis */
00770     float dvec[3] = {0, 0, 0}; /* this is the direction thast added to the view offset per redraw */
00771 
00772     /* Camera Uprighting variables */
00773     float upvec[3] = {0, 0, 0}; /* stores the view's up vector */
00774 
00775     float moffset[2]; /* mouse offset from the views center */
00776     float tmp_quat[4]; /* used for rotating the view */
00777 
00778 //  int cent_orig[2], /* view center */
00779 //XXX- can avoid using //   cent[2], /* view center modified */
00780     int xmargin, ymargin; /* x and y margin are define the safe area where the mouses movement wont rotate the view */
00781 
00782 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
00783     {
00784         static unsigned int iteration = 1;
00785         printf("fly timer %d\n", iteration++);
00786     }
00787 #endif
00788 
00789     xmargin = ar->winx / 20.0f;
00790     ymargin = ar->winy / 20.0f;
00791 
00792     // UNUSED
00793     // cent_orig[0]= ar->winrct.xmin + ar->winx/2;
00794     // cent_orig[1]= ar->winrct.ymin + ar->winy/2;
00795 
00796     {
00797 
00798         /* mouse offset from the center */
00799         moffset[0] = fly->mval[0] - ar->winx / 2;
00800         moffset[1] = fly->mval[1] - ar->winy / 2;
00801 
00802         /* enforce a view margin */
00803         if      (moffset[0] >  xmargin) moffset[0] -= xmargin;
00804         else if (moffset[0] < -xmargin) moffset[0] += xmargin;
00805         else                            moffset[0] =  0;
00806 
00807         if      (moffset[1] >  ymargin) moffset[1] -= ymargin;
00808         else if (moffset[1] < -ymargin) moffset[1] += ymargin;
00809         else                            moffset[1] =  0;
00810 
00811 
00812         /* scale the mouse movement by this value - scales mouse movement to the view size
00813          * moffset[0]/(ar->winx-xmargin*2) - window size minus margin (same for y)
00814          *
00815          * the mouse moves isn't linear */
00816 
00817         if (moffset[0]) {
00818             moffset[0] /= ar->winx - (xmargin * 2);
00819             moffset[0] *= fabsf(moffset[0]);
00820         }
00821 
00822         if (moffset[1]) {
00823             moffset[1] /= ar->winy - (ymargin * 2);
00824             moffset[1] *= fabsf(moffset[1]);
00825         }
00826 
00827         /* Should we redraw? */
00828         if ((fly->speed != 0.0f) ||
00829             moffset[0] || moffset[1] ||
00830             fly->zlock || fly->xlock ||
00831             dvec[0] || dvec[1] || dvec[2])
00832         {
00833             float dvec_tmp[3];
00834 
00835             /* time how fast it takes for us to redraw,
00836              * this is so simple scenes don't fly too fast */
00837             double time_current;
00838             float time_redraw;
00839             float time_redraw_clamped;
00840 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DRAW_TOOMUCH
00841             fly->redraw = 1;
00842 #endif
00843             time_current = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
00844             time_redraw = (float)(time_current - fly->time_lastdraw);
00845             time_redraw_clamped = MIN2(0.05f, time_redraw); /* clamp redraw time to avoid jitter in roll correction */
00846             fly->time_lastdraw = time_current;
00847 
00848             /* Scale the time to use shift to scale the speed down- just like
00849              * shift slows many other areas of blender down */
00850             if (fly->use_precision)
00851                 fly->speed = fly->speed * (1.0f - time_redraw_clamped);
00852 
00853             copy_m3_m4(mat, rv3d->viewinv);
00854 
00855             if (fly->pan_view == TRUE) {
00856                 /* pan only */
00857                 dvec_tmp[0] = -moffset[0];
00858                 dvec_tmp[1] = -moffset[1];
00859                 dvec_tmp[2] = 0;
00860 
00861                 if (fly->use_precision) {
00862                     dvec_tmp[0] *= 0.1f;
00863                     dvec_tmp[1] *= 0.1f;
00864                 }
00865 
00866                 mul_m3_v3(mat, dvec_tmp);
00867                 mul_v3_fl(dvec_tmp, time_redraw * 200.0f * fly->grid);
00868             }
00869             else {
00870                 float roll; /* similar to the angle between the camera's up and the Z-up,
00871                              * but its very rough so just roll */
00872 
00873                 /* rotate about the X axis- look up/down */
00874                 if (moffset[1]) {
00875                     upvec[0] = 1;
00876                     upvec[1] = 0;
00877                     upvec[2] = 0;
00878                     mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00879                     /* Rotate about the relative up vec */
00880                     axis_angle_to_quat(tmp_quat, upvec, (float)moffset[1] * time_redraw * -FLY_ROTATE_FAC);
00881                     mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, tmp_quat);
00882 
00883                     if (fly->xlock)
00884                         fly->xlock = 2;  /* check for rotation */
00885                     if (fly->zlock)
00886                         fly->zlock = 2;
00887                     fly->xlock_momentum = 0.0f;
00888                 }
00889 
00890                 /* rotate about the Y axis- look left/right */
00891                 if (moffset[0]) {
00892 
00893                     /* if we're upside down invert the moffset */
00894                     upvec[0] = 0.0f;
00895                     upvec[1] = 1.0f;
00896                     upvec[2] = 0.0f;
00897                     mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00898 
00899                     if (upvec[2] < 0.0f)
00900                         moffset[0] = -moffset[0];
00901 
00902                     /* make the lock vectors */
00903                     if (fly->zlock) {
00904                         upvec[0] = 0.0f;
00905                         upvec[1] = 0.0f;
00906                         upvec[2] = 1.0f;
00907                     }
00908                     else {
00909                         upvec[0] = 0.0f;
00910                         upvec[1] = 1.0f;
00911                         upvec[2] = 0.0f;
00912                         mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00913                     }
00914 
00915                     /* Rotate about the relative up vec */
00916                     axis_angle_to_quat(tmp_quat, upvec, (float)moffset[0] * time_redraw * FLY_ROTATE_FAC);
00917                     mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, tmp_quat);
00918 
00919                     if (fly->xlock)
00920                         fly->xlock = 2;  /* check for rotation */
00921                     if (fly->zlock)
00922                         fly->zlock = 2;
00923                 }
00924 
00925                 if (fly->zlock == 2) {
00926                     upvec[0] = 1.0f;
00927                     upvec[1] = 0.0f;
00928                     upvec[2] = 0.0f;
00929                     mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00930 
00931                     /* make sure we have some z rolling */
00932                     if (fabsf(upvec[2]) > 0.00001f) {
00933                         roll = upvec[2] * 5.0f;
00934                         upvec[0] = 0.0f; /* rotate the view about this axis */
00935                         upvec[1] = 0.0f;
00936                         upvec[2] = 1.0f;
00937 
00938                         mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00939                         /* Rotate about the relative up vec */
00940                         axis_angle_to_quat(tmp_quat, upvec,
00941                                            roll * time_redraw_clamped * fly->zlock_momentum * FLY_ZUP_CORRECT_FAC);
00942                         mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, tmp_quat);
00943 
00944                         fly->zlock_momentum += FLY_ZUP_CORRECT_ACCEL;
00945                     }
00946                     else {
00947                         fly->zlock = 1; /* don't check until the view rotates again */
00948                         fly->zlock_momentum = 0.0f;
00949                     }
00950                 }
00951 
00952                 if (fly->xlock == 2 && moffset[1] == 0) { /* only apply xcorrect when mouse isn't applying x rot */
00953                     upvec[0] = 0;
00954                     upvec[1] = 0;
00955                     upvec[2] = 1;
00956                     mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00957                     /* make sure we have some z rolling */
00958                     if (fabsf(upvec[2]) > 0.00001f) {
00959                         roll = upvec[2] * -5.0f;
00960 
00961                         upvec[0] = 1.0f; /* rotate the view about this axis */
00962                         upvec[1] = 0.0f;
00963                         upvec[2] = 0.0f;
00964 
00965                         mul_m3_v3(mat, upvec);
00966 
00967                         /* Rotate about the relative up vec */
00968                         axis_angle_to_quat(tmp_quat, upvec, roll * time_redraw_clamped * fly->xlock_momentum * 0.1f);
00969                         mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, tmp_quat);
00970 
00971                         fly->xlock_momentum += 0.05f;
00972                     }
00973                     else {
00974                         fly->xlock = 1; /* see above */
00975                         fly->xlock_momentum = 0.0f;
00976                     }
00977                 }
00978 
00979                 if (fly->axis == -1) {
00980                     /* pause */
00981                     zero_v3(dvec_tmp);
00982                 }
00983                 else if (!fly->use_freelook) {
00984                     /* Normal operation */
00985                     /* define dvec, view direction vector */
00986                     zero_v3(dvec_tmp);
00987                     /* move along the current axis */
00988                     dvec_tmp[fly->axis] = 1.0f;
00989 
00990                     mul_m3_v3(mat, dvec_tmp);
00991                 }
00992                 else {
00993                     normalize_v3_v3(dvec_tmp, fly->dvec_prev);
00994                     if (fly->speed < 0.0f) {
00995                         negate_v3(dvec_tmp);
00996                     }
00997                 }
00998 
00999                 mul_v3_fl(dvec_tmp, fly->speed * time_redraw * 0.25f);
01000             }
01001 
01002             /* impose a directional lag */
01003             interp_v3_v3v3(dvec, dvec_tmp, fly->dvec_prev, (1.0f / (1.0f + (time_redraw * 5.0f))));
01004 
01005             if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
01006                 Object *lock_ob = fly->root_parent ? fly->root_parent : fly->v3d->camera;
01007                 if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) dvec[0] = 0.0;
01008                 if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) dvec[1] = 0.0;
01009                 if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) dvec[2] = 0.0;
01010             }
01011 
01012             add_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, dvec);
01013 
01014             if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB)
01015                 move_camera(C, rv3d, fly, (fly->xlock || fly->zlock || moffset[0] || moffset[1]), fly->speed);
01016 
01017         }
01018         else {
01019             /* we're not redrawing but we need to update the time else the view will jump */
01020             fly->time_lastdraw = PIL_check_seconds_timer();
01021         }
01022         /* end drawing */
01023         copy_v3_v3(fly->dvec_prev, dvec);
01024     }
01025 
01026     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01027 }
01028 
01029 static int flyApply_ndof(bContext *C, FlyInfo *fly)
01030 {
01031     /* shorthand for oft-used variables */
01032     wmNDOFMotionData *ndof = fly->ndof;
01033     const float dt = ndof->dt;
01034     RegionView3D*rv3d = fly->rv3d;
01035     const int flag = U.ndof_flag;
01036 
01037 #if 0
01038     int shouldRotate = (flag & NDOF_SHOULD_ROTATE) && (fly->pan_view == FALSE),
01039         shouldTranslate = (flag & (NDOF_SHOULD_PAN | NDOF_SHOULD_ZOOM));
01040 #endif
01041 
01042     int shouldRotate = (fly->pan_view == FALSE);
01043     int shouldTranslate = TRUE;
01044 
01045     float view_inv[4];
01046     invert_qt_qt(view_inv, rv3d->viewquat);
01047 
01048     rv3d->rot_angle = 0.0f; /* disable onscreen rotation doo-dad */
01049 
01050     if (shouldTranslate) {
01051         const float forward_sensitivity  = 1.0f;
01052         const float vertical_sensitivity = 0.4f;
01053         const float lateral_sensitivity  = 0.6f;
01054 
01055         float speed = 10.0f; /* blender units per second */
01056         /* ^^ this is ok for default cube scene, but should scale with.. something */
01057 
01058         float trans[3] = {lateral_sensitivity  * ndof->tvec[0],
01059                           vertical_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[1],
01060                           forward_sensitivity  * ndof->tvec[2]};
01061 
01062         if (fly->use_precision)
01063             speed *= 0.2f;
01064 
01065         mul_v3_fl(trans, speed * dt);
01066 
01067         /* transform motion from view to world coordinates */
01068         mul_qt_v3(view_inv, trans);
01069 
01070         if (flag & NDOF_FLY_HELICOPTER) {
01071             /* replace world z component with device y (yes it makes sense) */
01072             trans[2] = speed * dt * vertical_sensitivity * ndof->tvec[1];
01073         }
01074 
01075         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
01076             /* respect camera position locks */
01077             Object *lock_ob = fly->root_parent ? fly->root_parent : fly->v3d->camera;
01078             if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCX) trans[0] = 0.0f;
01079             if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCY) trans[1] = 0.0f;
01080             if (lock_ob->protectflag & OB_LOCK_LOCZ) trans[2] = 0.0f;
01081         }
01082 
01083         if (!is_zero_v3(trans)) {
01084             /* move center of view opposite of hand motion (this is camera mode, not object mode) */
01085             sub_v3_v3(rv3d->ofs, trans);
01086             shouldTranslate = TRUE;
01087         }
01088         else {
01089             shouldTranslate = FALSE;
01090         }
01091     }
01092 
01093     if (shouldRotate) {
01094         const float turn_sensitivity = 1.0f;
01095 
01096         float rotation[4];
01097         float axis[3];
01098         float angle = turn_sensitivity * ndof_to_axis_angle(ndof, axis);
01099 
01100         if (fabsf(angle) > 0.0001f) {
01101             shouldRotate = TRUE;
01102 
01103             if (fly->use_precision)
01104                 angle *= 0.2f;
01105 
01106             /* transform rotation axis from view to world coordinates */
01107             mul_qt_v3(view_inv, axis);
01108 
01109             /* apply rotation to view */
01110             axis_angle_to_quat(rotation, axis, angle);
01111             mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, rotation);
01112 
01113             if (flag & NDOF_LOCK_HORIZON) {
01114                 /* force an upright viewpoint
01115                  * TODO: make this less... sudden */
01116                 float view_horizon[3] = {1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}; /* view +x */
01117                 float view_direction[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, -1.0f}; /* view -z (into screen) */
01118 
01119                 /* find new inverse since viewquat has changed */
01120                 invert_qt_qt(view_inv, rv3d->viewquat);
01121                 /* could apply reverse rotation to existing view_inv to save a few cycles */
01122 
01123                 /* transform view vectors to world coordinates */
01124                 mul_qt_v3(view_inv, view_horizon);
01125                 mul_qt_v3(view_inv, view_direction);
01126 
01127                 /* find difference between view & world horizons
01128                  * true horizon lives in world xy plane, so look only at difference in z */
01129                 angle = -asinf(view_horizon[2]);
01130 
01131 #ifdef NDOF_FLY_DEBUG
01132                 printf("lock horizon: adjusting %.1f degrees\n\n", RAD2DEG(angle));
01133 #endif
01134 
01135                 /* rotate view so view horizon = world horizon */
01136                 axis_angle_to_quat(rotation, view_direction, angle);
01137                 mul_qt_qtqt(rv3d->viewquat, rv3d->viewquat, rotation);
01138             }
01139 
01140             rv3d->view = RV3D_VIEW_USER;
01141         }
01142         else {
01143             shouldRotate = FALSE;
01144         }
01145     }
01146 
01147     if (shouldTranslate || shouldRotate) {
01148         fly->redraw = TRUE;
01149 
01150         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
01151             move_camera(C, rv3d, fly, shouldRotate, shouldTranslate);
01152         }
01153     }
01154 
01155     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01156 }
01157 
01158 static int fly_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01159 {
01160     RegionView3D *rv3d = CTX_wm_region_view3d(C);
01161     FlyInfo *fly;
01162 
01163     if (rv3d->viewlock)
01164         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01165 
01166     fly = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FlyInfo), "FlyOperation");
01167 
01168     op->customdata = fly;
01169 
01170     if (initFlyInfo(C, fly, op, event) == FALSE) {
01171         MEM_freeN(op->customdata);
01172         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01173     }
01174 
01175     flyEvent(fly, event);
01176 
01177     WM_event_add_modal_handler(C, op);
01178 
01179     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01180 }
01181 
01182 static int fly_cancel(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01183 {
01184     FlyInfo *fly = op->customdata;
01185 
01186     fly->state = FLY_CANCEL;
01187     flyEnd(C, fly);
01188     op->customdata = NULL;
01189 
01190     return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01191 }
01192 
01193 static int fly_modal(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *event)
01194 {
01195     int exit_code;
01196     short do_draw = FALSE;
01197     FlyInfo *fly = op->customdata;
01198     RegionView3D *rv3d = fly->rv3d;
01199     Object *fly_object = fly->root_parent ? fly->root_parent : fly->v3d->camera;
01200 
01201     fly->redraw = 0;
01202 
01203     flyEvent(fly, event);
01204 
01205     if (fly->ndof) { /* 3D mouse overrules [2D mouse + timer] */
01206         if (event->type == NDOF_MOTION) {
01207             flyApply_ndof(C, fly);
01208         }
01209     }
01210     else if (event->type == TIMER && event->customdata == fly->timer) {
01211         flyApply(C, fly);
01212     }
01213 
01214     do_draw |= fly->redraw;
01215 
01216     exit_code = flyEnd(C, fly);
01217 
01218     if (exit_code != OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL)
01219         do_draw = TRUE;
01220 
01221     if (do_draw) {
01222         if (rv3d->persp == RV3D_CAMOB) {
01223             WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT | ND_TRANSFORM, fly_object);
01224         }
01225 
01226         // puts("redraw!"); // too frequent, commented with NDOF_FLY_DRAW_TOOMUCH for now
01227         ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C));
01228     }
01229 
01230     return exit_code;
01231 }
01232 
01233 void VIEW3D_OT_fly(wmOperatorType *ot)
01234 {
01235     /* identifiers */
01236     ot->name = "Fly Navigation";
01237     ot->description = "Interactively fly around the scene";
01238     ot->idname = "VIEW3D_OT_fly";
01239 
01240     /* api callbacks */
01241     ot->invoke = fly_invoke;
01242     ot->cancel = fly_cancel;
01243     ot->modal = fly_modal;
01244     ot->poll = ED_operator_view3d_active;
01245 
01246     /* flags */
01247     ot->flag = OPTYPE_BLOCKING;
01248 }
